description:
Trunks and Krillin join Bulma at the crash site of the mysterious time capsule and find an eerie clue: the shell of a large, locust-like creature! Whatever arrived in the time capsule isn’t human, and it’s on the loose!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jaaku no Tomago o Hakken!! Kyoufu Suru Trunks
Le passager de la seconde machine à voyager dans le temps
Um ovo misterioso encontrado na máquina do tempo!!
ทรังคซ์หวาดผวา ไข่ปีศาจถูกค้นพบ
邪悪の卵を発見!! 恐怖するトランクス
